updates.title: Figma acquires AI-powered media generation company Weavy to integrate content creation capabilities into its design platform, signaling major expansion of AI tools for designers.
Apple CEO Tim Cook announces openness to AI-focused acquisitions while expanding partnerships beyond OpenAI integration, indicating accelerated AI strategy for creative tools.
YC-backed Adam raises $4.1M seed round to transform viral text-to-3D generation tool into comprehensive AI design copilot after generating 10+ million social media impressions.
Perplexity strikes multi-year licensing deal with Getty Images, legitimizing AI-powered search platform's use of stock photography and addressing previous plagiarism concerns.
AI industry shows bubble warning signs as CoreWeave's $5.4B Core Scientific acquisition fails while energy costs and consumer backlash against data centers intensify.
